docs.title: Run Template Orchestrator
docs.text: This repository contains the new Run Template Orchestrator used in the latest Cosmotech Solutions

docs.title: Console Scripts
docs.text:
The following console scripts are made available to you after installation of the orchestrator

Download scenario data

A script allowing to download dataset and parameters from a scenario

Data downloader

Download Cloud based Steps

A script used to download Run Template Handlers sourced in the cloud using the Cosmotech API

Download Cloud Steps

Run step

A script to run Steps from a Run Template

Run steps

Send Simulation Data to ADX

A script to send Simulation input data (Datasets/Parameters) to Azure Data Explorer

Simulation to ADX

docs.title: Download Steps from cloud
docs.text:
Command help

> cosmotech_download_cloud_steps --help
[1m                                                                                [0m
[1m [0m[1;33mUsage: [0m[1mcosmotech_download_cloud_steps [[0m[1;36mOPTIONS[0m[1m][0m[1m                               [0m[1m [0m
[1m                                                                                [0m
 Uses environment variables to download cloud based Template steps Requires a   
 valid Azure connection either with:                                            

 [1;33m • [0mThe AZ cli command: [1maz login[0m                                                
 [1;33m • [0mA triplet of env var [1;36;40mAZURE_TENANT_ID[0m, [1;36;40mAZURE_CLIENT_ID[0m, [1;36;40mAZURE_CLIENT_SECRET[0m  

[2m╭─[0m[2m Options [0m[2m───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────[0m[2m─╮[0m
[2m│[0m    [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-log[0m[1;36m-level[0m          [1;33mLVL                [0m  Either CRITICAL, ERROR,         [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              WARNING, INFO or DEBUG          [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              [2;33m[env var: LOG_LEVEL]           [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-organization[0m[1;36m-id[0m    [1;33mo-##########       [0m  The id of an organization in    [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              the cosmotech api               [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              [2;33m[env var: CSM_ORGANIZATION_ID] [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              [2;31m[required]                     [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-workspace[0m[1;36m-id[0m       [1;33mw-##########       [0m  The id of a solution in the     [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              cosmotech api                   [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              [2;33m[env var: CSM_WORKSPACE_ID]    [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              [2;31m[required]                     [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-run[0m[1;36m-template-id[0m    [1;33mNAME               [0m  The name of the run template in [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              the cosmotech api               [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              [2;33m[env var: CSM_RUN_TEMPLATE_ID] [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              [2;31m[required]                     [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-handler[0m[1;36m-list[0m       [1;33mHANDLER,...,HANDLER[0m  A list of handlers to download  [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              (comma separated)               [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              [2;33m[env var: CSM_CONTAINER_MODE]  [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              [2;31m[required]                     [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-api[0m[1;36m-url[0m            [1;33mURL                [0m  The url to a Cosmotech API      [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              [2;33m[env var: CSM_API_URL]         [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              [2;31m[required]                     [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-api[0m[1;36m-scope[0m          [1;33mURI                [0m  The identification scope of a   [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              Cosmotech API                   [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              [2;33m[env var: CSM_API_SCOPE]       [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                              [2;31m[required]                     [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m    [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-help[0m               [1;33m                   [0m  Show this message and exit.     [2m│[0m
[2m╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯[0m

docs.title: Run Template Step
docs.text:
Help command

> cosmotech_run_step --help
[1m                                                                                [0m
[1m [0m[1;33mUsage: [0m[1mcosmotech_run_step [[0m[1;36mOPTIONS[0m[1m] [0m[1;36mTEMPLATE[0m[1m [[0m[1;36mSTEPS[0m[1m]...[0m[1m                       [0m[1m [0m
[1m                                                                                [0m
 Runs a list of steps of a run template in a CosmoTech project                  

 [1;33m • [0m[1;2;36;40mTEMPLATE[0m[2m refer to a folder contained in [0m[1;2;36;40mcode/run_templates[0m[2m                 [0m 
 [1;33m • [0m[1;2;36;40mSTEPS[0m[2m is a list of Steps definer in the [0m[1;2;36;40mTEMPLATE[0m[2m folder that will be [0m[2m      [0m 
 [1;33m   [0m[2mexecuted[0m[2m                                                                   [0m 
 [1;33m   [0m[1;2;33m • [0m[2mdefaults to [0m[1;2;36;40mCSMDOCKER[0m[2m which represent the legacy order: [0m[2m                [0m 
 [1;33m   [0m[1;2;33m   [0m[1;2;36;40mparameters_handler[0m[2m - [0m[1;2;36;40mvalidator[0m[2m - [0m[1;2;36;40mprerun[0m[2m - [0m[1;2;36;40mengine[0m[2m - [0m[1;2;36;40mpostrun[0m[2m              [0m 

 [2mKnown limitations:[0m                                                             

 [1;33m • [0m[2mThe template MUST contain an executable main.py file[0m[2m                       [0m 
 [1;33m • [0m[2mThe engine step requires to set the env var CSM_SIMULATION if you have a [0m[2m  [0m 
 [1;33m   [0m[2mrun without a python engine[0m[2m                                                [0m 

[2m╭─[0m[2m Arguments [0m[2m─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────[0m[2m─╮[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36mTEMPLATE[0m    [1;33mTEXT[0m  [2;31m[required][0m                                              [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m    [1;36mSTEPS[0m       [1;33mTEXT[0m                                                          [2m│[0m
[2m╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯[0m
[2m╭─[0m[2m Options [0m[2m───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────[0m[2m─╮[0m
[2m│[0m [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-log[0m[1;36m-level[0m    [1;33mLVL[0m  Either CRITICAL, ERROR, WARNING, INFO or DEBUG           [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                     [2;33m[env var: LOG_LEVEL]                                    [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-help[0m         [1;33m   [0m  Show this message and exit.                              [2m│[0m
[2m╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯[0m

docs.text:
Help command

> cosmotech_scenario_downloader --help
[1m                                                                                [0m

 Requires a valid Azure connection either with:                                 

 [1;33m • [0mThe AZ cli command: [1maz login[0m                                                
 [1;33m • [0mA triplet of env var [1;36;40mAZURE_TENANT_ID[0m, [1;36;40mAZURE_CLIENT_ID[0m, [1;36;40mAZURE_CLIENT_SECRET[0m  

 Requires env var [1;36;40mCSM_API_URL    [0m [3mThe URL to a Cosmotech API[0m                    
 Requires env var [1;36;40mCSM_API_SCOPE  [0m [3mThe identification scope of a Cosmotech API[0m   

[2m╭─[0m[2m Options [0m[2m───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────[0m[2m─╮[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-organization[0m[1;36m-id[0m             [1;33mo-##########[0m  The id of an organization in  [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                the cosmotech api             [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                [2;33m[env var:                    [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                [2;33mCSM_ORGANIZATION_ID]         [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                [2;31m[required]                   [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-workspace[0m[1;36m-id[0m                [1;33mw-##########[0m  The id of a workspace in the  [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                cosmotech api                 [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                [2;33m[env var: CSM_WORKSPACE_ID]  [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                [2;31m[required]                   [0m [2m│[0m

[2m│[0m                                                cosmotech api                 [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                [2;33m[env var: CSM_SCENARIO_ID]   [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                [2;31m[required]                   [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-dataset[0m[1;36m-absolute-path[0m       [1;33mPATH        [0m  A local folder to store the   [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                main dataset content          [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                [2;33m[env var:                    [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                [2;33mCSM_DATASET_ABSOLUTE_PATH]   [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                [2;31m[required]                   [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-parameters[0m[1;36m-absolute-path[0m    [1;33mPATH        [0m  A local folder to store the   [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                parameters content            [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                [2;33m[env var:                    [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                [2;33mCSM_PARAMETERS_ABSOLUTE_PATH][0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                [2;31m[required]                   [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m    [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-log[0m[1;36m-level[0m                   [1;33mLVL         [0m  Either CRITICAL, ERROR,       [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                WARNING, INFO or DEBUG        [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                                [2;33m[env var: LOG_LEVEL]         [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m    [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-help[0m                        [1;33m            [0m  Show this message and exit.   [2m│[0m
[2m╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯[0m

docs.title: Simulation to ADX connector
docs.text:
Help command

> cosmotech_simulation_to_adx_connector --help
[1m                                                                                [0m
[1m [0m[1;33mUsage: [0m[1mcosmotech_simulation_to_adx_connector [[0m[1;36mOPTIONS[0m[1m][0m[1m                        [0m[1m [0m
[1m                                                                                [0m
 Uses environment variables to send content of CSV files to ADX Requires a      
 valid Azure connection either with:                                            

 [1;33m • [0mThe AZ cli command: [1maz login[0m                                                
 [1;33m • [0mA triplet of env var [1;36;40mAZURE_TENANT_ID[0m, [1;36;40mAZURE_CLIENT_ID[0m, [1;36;40mAZURE_CLIENT_SECRET[0m  

[2m╭─[0m[2m Options [0m[2m───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────[0m[2m─╮[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-dataset[0m[1;36m-absolute-path[0m            [1;33mPATH[0m  A local folder to store the main [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             dataset content                  [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33m[env var:                       [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33mCSM_DATASET_ABSOLUTE_PATH]      [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;31m[required]                      [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-parameters[0m[1;36m-absolute-path[0m         [1;33mPATH[0m  A local folder to store the      [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             parameters content               [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33m[env var:                       [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33mCSM_PARAMETERS_ABSOLUTE_PATH]   [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;31m[required]                      [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-simulation[0m[1;36m-id[0m                    [1;33mUUID[0m  the Simulation Id to add to      [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             records                          [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33m[env var: CSM_SIMULATION_ID]    [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;31m[required]                      [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-adx[0m[1;36m-uri[0m                          [1;33mURI [0m  the ADX cluster path (URI info   [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             can be found into ADX cluster    [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             page)                            [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33m[env var:                       [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33mAZURE_DATA_EXPLORER_RESOURCE_UR…[0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;31m[required]                      [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-adx[0m[1;36m-ingest-uri[0m                   [1;33mURI [0m  The ADX cluster ingest path (URI [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             info can be found into ADX       [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             cluster page)                    [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33m[env var:                       [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33mAZURE_DATA_EXPLORER_RESOURCE_IN…[0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;31m[required]                      [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m [31m*[0m  [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-database[0m[1;36m-name[0m                    [1;33mNAME[0m  The targeted database name       [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33m[env var:                       [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33mAZURE_DATA_EXPLORER_DATABASE_NA…[0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;31m[required]                      [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m    [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-send[0m[1;36m-parameters[0m/[1;36m-[0m[1;36m-no[0m[1;36m-send-pa…[0m    [1;33m    [0m  whether or not to send           [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             parameters (parameters path is   [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             mandatory then)                  [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33m[env var:                       [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33mCSM_SEND_DATAWAREHOUSE_PARAMETE…[0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m    [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-send[0m[1;36m-datasets[0m/[1;36m-[0m[1;36m-no[0m[1;36m-send-data…[0m    [1;33m    [0m  whether or not to send datasets  [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             (parameters path is mandatory    [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             then)                            [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33m[env var:                       [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33mCSM_SEND_DATAWAREHOUSE_DATASETS][0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m    [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-wait[0m/[1;36m-[0m[1;36m-no[0m[1;36m-wait[0m                   [1;33m    [0m  Toggle waiting for the ingestion [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             results                          [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33m[env var: WAIT_FOR_INGESTION]   [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m    [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-log[0m[1;36m-level[0m                        [1;33mLVL [0m  Either CRITICAL, ERROR, WARNING, [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             INFO or DEBUG                    [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m                                             [2;33m[env var: LOG_LEVEL]            [0m [2m│[0m
[2m│[0m    [1;36m-[0m[1;36m-help[0m                             [1;33m    [0m  Show this message and exit.      [2m│[0m
[2m╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯[0m
